sentences.english: She was out of her head to go swimming in this freezing weather.
sentences.chinese: 她瘋瘋癲癲的，這麼寒冷的天氣還跑去游泳。

sentences.english: There's a strain of madness in the family.
sentences.chinese: 那一家人都有點瘋瘋癲癲的。

sentences.english: But he was certainly a little bit mad .
sentences.chinese: 可是他的確也有點兒瘋瘋癲癲。

sentences.english: Repeated every day, going gaga mouth, when is the end.
sentences.chinese: 天天重複過着，瘋瘋癲癲的餬口，什麼時候纔是盡頭。

sentences.english: I freely confess I'm as dotty as you are.
sentences.chinese: 我坦白承認，我跟你一樣瘋瘋癲癲。

definition: to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
to show off/to put on a show to amuse others
to make fun of/to seek diversion
to step down gracefully (humble expression)/to concede defeat/to play second fiddle
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
